channel.title: [PI] NPC Teleport. *Not what you'd think*

item.title: [PI] NPC Teleport. *Not what you'd think*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:459982”]Make the dialogue check for int values to send different dialogues. When you get the reward, add in something like c.recievedReward = 1; or something like that.[/quote]Okay, I am going to use this idea.
Could you tell me what files I will be editing so I don’t miss anything? Or just help me with it?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] NPC Teleport. *Not what you'd think*
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Find the hard coded nex tutorial and try to find it in there. There is a method that makes him teleport to different spots. You could manipulate that method to your liking if you could find it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] NPC Teleport. *Not what you'd think*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:459982”]Make the dialogue check for int values to send different dialogues. When you get the reward, add in something like c.recievedReward = 1; or something like that.[/quote]I could do that, but I actually want to know how to make the NPC teleport away? Any idea how?

item.title: [PI] NPC Teleport. *Not what you'd think*
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Make the dialogue check for int values to send different dialogues. When you get the reward, add in something like c.recievedReward = 1; or something like that.

item.title: [PI] NPC Teleport. *Not what you'd think*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Okay so I have added a quest today, but when you complete it and get the reward, you can just keep clicking the NPC for the same reward!!!
I would like to know how to make it to where when you finish the quest and get your reward. There NPC teleports away? Or like, disappears for you.
I was thinking something along the lines of:

if (c.newYear == 3) { c.getItems().addItem(995, 25000000); c.npcTeleport(2342, 2352); //<-- Something similar to that? Idk how to make a npc teleport itself away. }

Read full topic
